query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 «Pape Satàn, pape Satàn aleppe!», 2 cominciò Pluto con la voce chioccia; 3 e quel savio gentil, che tutto seppe,
4 disse per confortarmi: «Non ti noccia 5 la tua paura; ché, poder ch’elli abbia, 6 non ci torrà lo scender questa roccia».
query.result:
**English:**
1 "Pape Satan, pape Satan aleppe!", 2 Pluto began with a hoarse voice; 3 and that wise and gentle sage, who knew all,
4 said to comfort me: "Do not let 5 your fear harm you; for, whatever power he may have, 6 he will not prevent us from descending this rock".
**Malay:**
1 "Pape Satan, pape Satan aleppe!", 2 mulailah Pluto dengan suara serak; 3 dan orang bijak yang lembut itu, yang tahu segalanya,
4 berkata untuk menghiburku: "Jangan biarkan 5 ketakutanmu menyakitimu; karena, apa pun kekuatan yang dimilikinya, 6 dia tidak akan mencegah kita untuk menuruni batu ini".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Poi si rivolse a quella ’nfiata labbia, 8 e disse: «Taci, maladetto lupo! 9 consuma dentro te con la tua rabbia.
query.result:
**English:**
7 Then he turned to that swollen muzzle, 8 and said: "Be silent, cursed wolf! 9 Consume yourself with your own rage.
**Malay:**
7 Kemudian dia berpaling ke moncong yang bengkak itu, 8 dan berkata: "Diamlah, serigala terkutuk! 9 Hanguskan dirimu sendiri dengan amarahmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Non è sanza cagion l’andare al cupo: 11 vuolsi ne l’alto, là dove Michele 12 fé la vendetta del superbo strupo».
query.result:
**English:**
10 It is not without reason that one goes to the depths: 11 one must go up high, there where Michael 12 took vengeance for the proud ravishment.
**Malay:**
10 Bukanlah tanpa alasan untuk pergi ke tempat yang dalam: 11 seseorang harus naik ke tempat yang tinggi, di sana tempatnya Michael 12 melakukan pembalasan atas pencabulan yang angkuh.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Quali dal vento le gonfiate vele 14 caggiono avvolte, poi che l’alber fiacca, 15 tal cadde a terra la fiera crudele.
query.result:
**English:**
13 Like sails filled with wind 14 fall twisted, after the mast breaks, 15 so fell to the ground the cruel beast.
**Malay:**
13 Seperti layar yang dipenuhi angin 14 jatuh terpilin, setelah tiang patah, 15 demikianlah jatuh ke tanah binatang buas yang kejam itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 Così scendemmo ne la quarta lacca, 17 pigliando più de la dolente ripa 18 che ’l mal de l’universo tutto insacca.
query.result:
**English:**
16 Thus we descended into the fourth chasm, 17 taking more of the sorrowful bank 18 that ensnares the evil of the entire universe.
**Malay:**
16 Demikianlah kami turun ke jurang keempat, 17 mengambil lebih banyak dari tebing yang menyedihkan 18 yang menjerat kejahatan seluruh alam semesta.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Ahi giustizia di Dio! tante chi stipa 20 nove travaglie e pene quant’ io viddi? 21 e perché nostra colpa sì ne scipa?
22 Come fa l’onda là sovra Cariddi, 23 che si frange con quella in cui s’intoppa, 24 così convien che qui la gente riddi.
query.result:
**English:**
19 Ah, justice of God! How many souls are crowded 20 with new travails and torments, as I saw? 21 And why does our fault so waste us away?
22 As the wave does there above Charybdis, 23 that breaks against the wave it meets, 24 so here the people must dance in a ring.
**Malay:**
19 Ah, keadilan Tuhan! Berapa banyak jiwa yang sesak 20 dengan kesusahan dan siksaan baru, seperti yang kulihat? 21 Dan mengapa kesalahan kita begitu menyiksa kita?
22 Seperti ombak di atas sana di atas Charybdis, 23 yang pecah dengan ombak yang ditabraknya, 24 begitulah orang-orang di sini harus menari dalam lingkaran.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Qui vid’ i’ gente più ch’altrove troppa, 26 e d’una parte e d’altra, con grand’ urli, 27 voltando pesi per forza di poppa.
query.result:
**English:**
25 Here I saw more people than elsewhere, 26 and on one side and the other, with great shouts, 27 they were pushing weights by force of their chests.
**Malay:**
25 Di sini kulihat lebih banyak orang daripada di tempat lain, 26 dan di satu sisi dan sisi lainnya, dengan teriakan keras, 27 mereka mendorong beban dengan kekuatan dada mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Percotëansi ’ncontro; e poscia pur lì 29 si rivolgea ciascun, voltando a retro, 30 gridando: «Perché tieni?» e «Perché burli?».
query.result:
**English:**
28 They strike each other head-on; and then each one 29 turns around, retreating backward, 30 shouting: "Why do you hold?" and "Why do you strike?"
**Malay:**
28 Mereka saling pukul; dan kemudian masing-masing 29 berbalik, mundur ke belakang, 30 berteriak: "Mengapa kamu pegang?" dan "Mengapa kamu pukul?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
36 E io, ch’avea lo cor quasi compunto,
37 dissi: «Maestro mio, or mi dimostra 38 che gente è questa, e se tutti fuor cherci 39 questi chercuti a la sinistra nostra».
query.result:
**English:**
36 And I, whose heart was almost pierced,
37 said: "My Master, now show me 38 what people these are, and if all the shorn ones 39 on our left are being sought."
**Malay:**
36 Dan aku, yang hatiku hampir tertusuk,
37 berkata: "Tuanku, sekarang tunjukkan padaku 38 orang-orang apakah ini, dan apakah semua yang dicukur 39 di sebelah kiri kita sedang dicari."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Ed elli a me: «Tutti quanti fuor guerci 41 sì de la mente in la vita primaia, 42 che con misura nullo spendio ferci.
query.result:
**English:**
40 And he to me: "All those were purblind 41 in intellect in the first life, 42 so that they made no expenditure with measure.
**Malay:**
40 Dan dia kepadaku: "Semua mereka itu buta 41 dalam intelek dalam kehidupan pertama, 42 sehingga mereka tidak membuat pengeluaran dengan ukuran.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 Assai la voce lor chiaro l’abbaia, 44 quando vegnono a’ due punti del cerchio 45 dove colpa contraria li dispaia.
query.result:
**English:**
43 Their barking is very clear and loud, 44 when they come to the two points of the circle 45 where opposite faults separate them.
**Malay:**
43 Gonggongan mereka sangat jelas dan kuat, 44 ketika mereka sampai di dua titik lingkaran 45 di mana kesalahan yang berlawanan memisahkan mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 Questi fuor cherci, che non han coperchio 47 piloso al capo, e papi e cardinali, 48 in cui usa avarizia il suo soperchio».
query.result:
**English:**
46 These outside seek, who have no covering 47 of hair on their heads, and are popes and cardinals, 48 in whom avarice employs its excess.
**Malay:**
46 Mereka di luar sana mencari, yang tidak mempunyai penutup 47 berbulu di kepala mereka, dan paus dan kardinal, 48 yang di dalamnya ketamakan menggunakan kelebihannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 E io: «Maestro, tra questi cotali 50 dovre’ io ben riconoscere alcuni 51 che furo immondi di cotesti mali».
query.result:
**English:**
49 And I: "Master, among these such 50 I should indeed recognize some 51 who were unclean with these evils".
**Malay:**
49 Dan aku: "Guru, di antara orang-orang seperti ini 50 aku seharusnya mengenali beberapa 51 yang najis dengan kejahatan-kejahatan ini".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Ed elli a me: «Vano pensiero aduni: 53 la sconoscente vita che i fé sozzi, 54 ad ogne conoscenza or li fa bruni.
query.result:
**English:**
52 And he to me: "Vain thoughts of the world: 53 the unknown life which made them vile, 54 now makes them dark to every knowledge.
**Malay:**
52 Dan dia kepadaku: "Pikiran-pikiran dunia yang sia-sia: 53 kehidupan yang tidak dikenal yang membuat mereka hina, 54 sekarang membuat mereka gelap terhadap setiap pengetahuan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 In etterno verranno a li due cozzi: 56 questi resurgeranno del sepulcro 57 col pugno chiuso, e questi coi crin mozzi.
query.result:
**English:**
55 Eternally will the two goats come: 56 these will rise from the tomb 57 with clenched fists, and these with cropped hair.
**Malay:**
55 Selama-lamanya kedua kambing itu akan datang: 56 yang ini akan bangkit dari kubur 57 dengan tangan terkepal, dan yang ini dengan rambut terpotong.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Mal dare e mal tener lo mondo pulcro 59 ha tolto loro, e posti a questa zuffa: 60 qual ella sia, parole non ci appulcro.
query.result:
**English:**
58 Evil to give and evil to keep the beautiful world 59 has taken from them, and placed them in this fight: 60 what it is like, words cannot embellish for us.
**Malay:**
58 Kejahatan untuk memberi dan kejahatan untuk menjaga dunia yang indah 59 telah merampas mereka, dan menempatkan mereka dalam pertikaian ini: 60 seperti apa itu, kata-kata tidak dapat memperindahnya bagi kita.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 «Maestro mio», diss’ io, «or mi dì anche: 68 questa fortuna di che tu mi tocche, 69 che è, che i ben del mondo ha sì tra branche?».
query.result:
**English:**
67 "My master," I said, "now tell me also: 68 this fortune that you touch upon, 69 what is it, that the goods of the world has so in its clutches?"
**Malay:**
67 "Guruku," kataku, "sekarang katakan juga padaku: 68 keberuntungan ini yang kau singgung, 69 apakah itu, bahwa kebaikan dunia begitu dalam genggamannya?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 E quelli a me: «Oh creature sciocche, 71 quanta ignoranza è quella che v’offende! 72 Or vo’ che tu mia sentenza ne ’mbocche.
query.result:
**English:**
70 And those to me: "Oh foolish creatures, 71 how much ignorance is that which offends you! 72 Now I want you to take my judgment into your mouth.
**Malay:**
70 Dan mereka kepadaku: "Oh makhluk-makhluk bodoh, 71 betapa banyaknya kebodohan yang menyinggung kalian! 72 Sekarang aku ingin kalian menerima penghakiman-Ku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Colui lo cui saver tutto trascende, 74 fece li cieli e diè lor chi conduce 75 sì, ch’ogne parte ad ogne parte splende,
76 distribuendo igualmente la luce.
query.result:
**English:**
73 He whose knowledge transcends all things, 74 made the heavens and gave them their guide, 75 so that every part shines upon every other part,
76 distributing the light equally.
**Malay:**
73 Dia yang pengetahuannya melampaui segala sesuatu, 74 menciptakan langit dan memberi mereka pemandu, 75 sehingga setiap bagian bersinar pada setiap bagian lainnya,
76 mendistribusikan cahaya secara merata.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
77 Similemente a li splendor mondani 78 ordinò general ministra e duce
79 che permutasse a tempo li ben vani 80 di gente in gente e d’uno in altro sangue, 81 oltre la difension d’i senni umani;
82 per ch’una gente impera e l’altra langue, 83 seguendo lo giudicio di costei, 84 che è occulto come in erba l’angue.
query.result:
**English:**
77 Similarly to these worldly splendors 78 she ordained a general minister and leader
79 who would exchange in time the vain goods 80 from people to people and from one blood to another, 81 beyond the defense of human senses;
82 so that one people rules and another languishes, 83 following the judgment of this one, 84 who is hidden like a snake in the grass.
**Malay:**
77 Begitu juga dengan kemegahan duniawi ini 78 ia menugaskan seorang menteri dan pemimpin umum
79 yang akan menukar pada waktunya barang-barang sia-sia 80 dari satu orang ke orang lain dan dari satu darah ke darah yang lain, 81 melampaui pertahanan akal manusia;
82 sehingga satu bangsa berkuasa dan bangsa lain merana, 83 mengikuti penilaian orang ini, 84 yang tersembunyi seperti ular di rerumputan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Vostro saver non ha contasto a lei: 86 questa provede, giudica, e persegue 87 suo regno come il loro li altri dèi.
query.result:
**English:**
85 Your knowledge has no power against her: 86 she provides, judges, and pursues 87 her kingdom like the other gods do theirs.
**Malay:**
85 Pengetahuanmu tidak ada tandingannya baginya: 86 dia menyediakan, mengadili, dan mengejar 87 kerajaannya seperti para dewa lainnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 Le sue permutazion non hanno triegue: 89 necessità la fa esser veloce; 90 sì spesso vien chi vicenda consegue.
query.result:
**English:**
88 Her permutations have no truce: 89 necessity makes her swift; 90 so often does he come who achieves change.
**Malay:**
88 Permutasinya tidak ada gencatan senjata: 89 kebutuhan membuatnya cepat; 90 begitu sering datangnya dia yang mencapai perubahan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Or discendiamo omai a maggior pieta; 98 già ogne stella cade che saliva 99 quand’ io mi mossi, e ’l troppo star si vieta».
query.result:
**English:**
97 Now let us descend to greater pity; 98 already every star is falling that was rising 99 when I set out, and to linger too long is forbidden."
**Malay:**
97 Sekarang mari kita turun ke belas kasihan yang lebih besar; 98 kini setiap bintang yang sedang naik telah jatuh 99 ketika aku berangkat, dan terlalu lama tinggal adalah terlarang."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 Noi ricidemmo il cerchio a l’altra riva 101 sovr’ una fonte che bolle e riversa 102 per un fossato che da lei deriva.
query.result:
**English:**
100 We cut across to the other bank 101 over a spring that bubbles and pours 102 through a ditch that flows from it.
**Malay:**
100 Kami memotong lingkaran ke tepi yang lain 101 di atas mata air yang menggelegak dan mengalir 102 melalui parit yang mengalir darinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 L’acqua era buia assai più che persa; 104 e noi, in compagnia de l’onde bige, 105 intrammo giù per una via diversa.
query.result:
**English:**
103 The water was much darker than purple; 104 and we, in the company of the gray waves, 105 entered down through a different path.
**Malay:**
103 Air itu jauh lebih gelap daripada ungu; 104 dan kami, bersama ombak kelabu, 105 masuk ke bawah melalui jalan yang berbeda.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 In la palude va c’ha nome Stige 107 questo tristo ruscel, quand’ è disceso 108 al piè de le maligne piagge grige.
query.result:
**English:**
106 Into the marsh called Styx 107 this dismal stream descends 108 at the foot of the grim gray slopes.
**Malay:**
106 Ke dalam rawa yang bernama Styx 107 sungai yang menyedihkan ini, ketika telah turun 108 ke kaki lereng-lereng kelabu yang menyeramkan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 E io, che di mirare stava inteso, 110 vidi genti fangose in quel pantano, 111 ignude tutte, con sembiante offeso.
query.result:
**English:**
109 And I, who was intent on gazing, 110 saw muddy people in that swamp, 111 all naked, with offended countenances.
**Malay:**
109 Dan aku, yang sedang asyik menatap, 110 melihat orang-orang berlumpur di rawa itu, 111 semuanya telanjang, dengan wajah-wajah yang tersinggung.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Queste si percotean non pur con mano, 113 ma con la testa e col petto e coi piedi, 114 troncandosi co’ denti a brano a brano.
query.result:
**English:**
112 They beat each other not only with their hands, 113 but with their heads and chests and feet, 114 tearing each other to pieces with their teeth.
**Malay:**
112 Mereka memukul satu sama lain bukan hanya dengan tangan mereka, 113 tetapi dengan kepala, dada, dan kaki mereka, 114 mencabik-cabik satu sama lain dengan gigi mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Lo buon maestro disse: «Figlio, or vedi 116 l’anime di color cui vinse l’ira; 117 e anche vo’ che tu per certo credi
118 che sotto l’acqua è gente che sospira, 119 e fanno pullular quest’ acqua al summo, 120 come l’occhio ti dice, u’ che s’aggira.
query.result:
**English:**
115 The good master said: "Son, now you see 116 the souls of those whom anger overcame; 117 and I also want you to believe for sure
118 that under the water there are people who sigh, 119 and they make this water bubble up to the surface, 120 as your eyes tell you, where it moves about.
**Malay:**
115 Guru yang baik berkata: "Nak, sekarang kamu lihat 116 jiwa-jiwa mereka yang dikuasai amarah; 117 dan aku juga ingin kamu percaya dengan pasti
118 bahwa di bawah air ada orang-orang yang mendesah, 119 dan mereka membuat air ini bergelembung ke permukaan, 120 seperti yang dikatakan matamu, di mana ia bergerak.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 Fitti nel limo dicon: “Tristi fummo 122 ne l’aere dolce che dal sol s’allegra, 123 portando dentro accidïoso fummo:
124 or ci attristiam ne la belletta negra”.
query.result:
**English:**
121 Stuck in the mud, they say: “We were sad 122 in the sweet air that rejoices in the sun, 123 bearing envious smoke within us:
124 now we grieve in the black mire”.
**Malay:**
121 Terperangkap dalam lumpur, mereka berkata: “Kami sedih 122 di udara manis yang bergembira karena matahari, 123 membawa asap dengki di dalam diri kami:
124 sekarang kami bersedih dalam lumpur hitam”.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
125 Quest’ inno si gorgoglian ne la strozza, 126 ché dir nol posson con parola integra».
127 Così girammo de la lorda pozza 128 grand’ arco tra la ripa secca e ’l mézzo, 129 con li occhi vòlti a chi del fango ingozza.
query.result:
**English:**
125 This hymn gurgles in their throats, 126 for they cannot speak it with complete words.
127 Thus we circled the filthy pool 128 in a wide arc between the dry bank and the center, 129 with our eyes fixed on those who gorge themselves on the mud.
**Malay:**
125 Himne ini berdeguk-deguk di kerongkongan mereka, 126 karena mereka tidak dapat mengucapkannya dengan kata-kata yang lengkap.
127 Demikianlah kami mengelilingi kolam yang kotor itu 128 dalam lengkungan besar antara tepi yang kering dan bagian tengah, 129 dengan mata kami tertuju pada mereka yang melahap lumpur.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Venimmo al piè d’una torre al da sezzo.
query.result:
**English:**
130 We came to the foot of a tower at last.
**Malay:**
130 Akhirnya kami sampai di kaki sebuah menara.
